issues: Problem starting the release as only the TC build was done, and it confused release-runner. [Bug 1307326](https://bugzil.la/1307326). Worked around by waiting for buildbot and restarting in ship-it
uptake monitoring burns out before sha1 repacks are all done. Known [Bug 1300060](https://bugzil.la/1300060). Rerun successfully with tctalker.
